{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DI-614+ |revision=B1 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=03/14/2003 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Global Sun |manuf_model=GL2422RT-1T8 |manuf_rev= |availability=common |type=wireless router |fcc_id=KA2ACX100,O7J-GL2422MP-MT |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.2 |pwr_barrel_len=10 |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Conexant |cpu1_model=CX82100-41 |cpu1_cspeed=168 |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV800BTC-90 |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=ICSI |ram1_model=IC42S16400-7T |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Global Sun GL2422MP-MT |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Texas Instruments |wi1_chip1_model=ACX100 |wi1_chip2_brand=Maxim |wi1_chip2_model=MAX2820 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6060 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os=ThreadX; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=default |default_ssid_regex=^default$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass= |oui=00:0D:88, 00:40:05 |oui_eth=00:0D:88, 00:40:05 }} {{SupportPage|vendor=D-Link|model=DI-614%2B}}, [http://support.dlink.com/emulators/di614plus_revB/ Interface emulator] OEM Global Sun GL2422RT-1T8 (silkscreened on the board), the firmware contains the string GL2422RT-1T7-B10 [http://mozy.org/DI-614/ internal shots at mozy.org]
[http://hri.sourceforge.net/hw/index.html on the HRI hardware table] :OS noted as '''ThreadX''' [http://fixunix.com/freebsd/310085-wpa-dlink-di-614-a.html OUI mention on a B2] :The B2 appears to be made in China. == Images == File:D-Link_DI-614+_main.jpg|main [[Has images::external| ]] ===from [[User:M86|M86]]=== Image:D-Link_DI-614+_rev_B1_non-scan_board_top_card_removed.JPG|board top, card removed Image:D-Link_DI-614+_rev_B1_non-scan_board_top_card_removed_2.JPG|board top, card removed Image:D-Link_DI-614+_rev_B1_non-scan_board_top_CX82100-41.JPG|CX82100-41 SoC Image:D-Link_DI-614+_rev_B1_Flash.JPG|Flash Image:D-Link_DI-614+_rev_B1_RAM.JPG|RAM Image:D-Link_DI-614+_rev_B1_non-scan_board_top_left_side.JPG|board top, side 1 (L/R depending on orientation..) Image:D-Link_DI-614+_rev_B1_non-scan_board_top_mid-board.JPG|mid-board Image:D-Link_DI-614+_rev_B1_non-scan_board_top_right_side.JPG|board top, side 1 (R/L depending on orientation..) Image:D-Link_DI-614+_rev_B1_WImodule_bottom.JPG|wireless module, bottom Image:D-Link_DI-614+_rev_B1_WImodule_top_HSadded.JPG|wireless module top, heatsink added Image:D-Link_DI-614+_rev_B1_non-scan_board_bottom.JPG|board bottom Image:D-Link_DI-614+_rev_B1_non-scan_board_bottom_under_header.JPG|bottom, under header + traces Image:D-Link_DI-614+_rev_B1_chassis_bottom_resin_code+etc.JPG|inner portion of bottom base (resin code 7) minus some pieces Image:D-Link_DI-614+_rev_B1_bottom+label.JPG|bottom + label [[Has images::label| ]] File:D-Link DI-614+ rev B1 board top card in.jpg|board top shot, card in File:D-Link DI-614+ rev B1 board top card removed.jpg|board shot top, top card removed File:D-Link DI-614+ rev B1 board bot.jpg|board bottom [[Has images::internal| ]]
